title: Did you know that you can run Python on iPhone and Android for free?#shorts
description: For more detailed videos, watch these: Python on iPhone:   Python on Android:   #python #iphone #android
transcript: Do you know that you can run Python for free on an iPhone as well as an Android device? Let me know in the comments below what your favorite application is. On an iPhone I'm using the Carnets Jupiter application as an example here if I press run you can see that my Python script hello world has been run here I could type some other code let's say x = 3 what is X so if I press run the value is 3 the application that I'm using on Android is Pydroid 3 on Android I've got the script print "hello world" I could press play and notice the output is Hello World very simple script what I like about both of these applications is they support Jupiter notebooks what I don't like about Pydroid is there's a free and paid version and to get all the extra functionality you need to go for the paid version but you can do a lot with the free version and that's what I really like about the Carnets application it's totally free two fantastic Python applications but
